description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省的国家监察机关，与中国共产党浙江省纪律检查委员会合署办公。
description.en: The state supervisory organ of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China, which works jointly with the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

nodes.id: 中国共产党浙江省纪律检查委员会

description.en: The discipline inspection body of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee, which works jointly with the Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省的省会。
description.en: The capital of Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党浙江省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 浙江省监察委员会与中国共产党浙江省纪律检查委员会合署办公，共同简称为“浙江省纪委省监委”。
description.en: The Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission works jointly with the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection, and they are collectively referred to as the 'Zhejiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervisory Commission'.

description.zh-cn: 由浙江省第十四届人民代表大会选举产生。
description.en: Elected by the 14th Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省监察委员会首届主任，由浙江省第十二届人民代表大会选举产生。
description.en: The first Director of the Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission, elected by the 12th Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国宪法》是设立浙江省监察委员会的法律依据之一。
description.en: The Constitution of the People's Republic of China is one of the legal bases for the establishment of the Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国监察法

description.zh-cn: 《中华人民共和国监察法》是设立浙江省监察委员会的法律依据之一。
description.en: The Supervision Law of the People's Republic of China is one of the legal bases for the establishment of the Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省监察委员会成立后，接替了原浙江省监察厅。
description.en: After its establishment, the Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission succeeded the former Zhejiang Provincial Department of Supervision.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 浙江省监察委员会业务上接受中华人民共和国国家监察委员会的领导。
description.en: The Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission is professionally led by the National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省监察委员会由浙江省人民代表大会产生，并对其负责。
description.en: The Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission is created by and responsible to the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 浙江省监察委员会对浙江省人民代表大会常务委员会负责。
description.en: The Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission is responsible to the Standing Committee of the Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党浙江省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共浙江省纪委是中共中央纪委的下级单位。
description.en: The CPC Zhejiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection is a subordinate unit of the CPC Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.source: 中国共产党浙江省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党浙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党浙江省纪律检查委员会是中国共产党浙江省委员会的纪律检查机构。
description.en: The CPC Zhejiang Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection is the discipline inspection body of the CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月20日，浙江省十二届人大五次会议选举任泽民为浙江省监察委员会主任。
description.en: On January 20, 2017, the 5th Session of the 12th Zhejiang Provincial People's Congress elected Ren Zemin as the Director of the Zhejiang Provincial Supervisory Commission.
